articles.title: How to Design Backups in SQL Server?
articles.description:
The Recovery Point Objective (RPO) and Recovery Time Objective (RTO) are basic concepts related to the information to be recovered and the time that it will take to recover....
The post How to Design Backups in SQL Server? appeared first on SQLServerCentral.
articles.content: The Recovery Point Objective (RPO) and Recovery Time Objective (RTO) are basic concepts related to the information to be recovered and the time that it will take to recover. In a Recovery Design plan… [+3672 chars]
